messages.message: <!subteam^SQ3KR3V17> reminder to do your UATs!!! we are tracking to finishing in 2021 at this rate
Also, you can automate in Ghost Inspector https://app.ghostinspector.com/ for next time
example test https://app.ghostinspector.com/tests/5de7cd21b9ef6d1f37d68e8d if you need help with accessing css selectors, etc for treepicker
don't be a fool - you can duplicate ghost inspector tests! i only realized that by test 3 and now my arm hurts from all the copy-pasta-ing
Also everyone says to not use it but I find that using the Ghost Inspector chrome plugin to record actions and then going back to make them more robust is extremely helpful!
Why does everyone say not to use it? That sounds quite helpful
yea that actually seems the way to go. cause all that "add new step" clicking is too much
some of us have early onset rsi to deal with
@will i think because the css selectors aren't great
but probably easy to get the bad ones first, then just fix the css selectors
